description:
The Dead Man’s Mail treasure map in Avowed sends you into one of Shatterscarp’s most dangerous areas on a quest for pants of questionable origin.

Still, if you need more distractions in battle than your two companions provide, it’s worth putting up with some tough fights to find the treasure. In addition to getting one of the most, um, daring pieces of Avowed fashion, you also gain a new ability t
title: Dead Man’s Mail treasure map location and solution in Avowed

description:
The Seafarer’s Boots treasure map in Avowed gives you a bit more to go on than the other two Shatterscarp maps, Robe of the Arcane Cheater and Dead Man’s Mail.

Sure, the reference image is just rocks and water, but there’s only one area in the region with red water: the Sulfur Mines. Compared to the Robe of the Arcane Cheater, finding this treasure is much safer and simpler, and the boots waiting for you at the end are perfect
title: Seafarer’s Boots treasure map location and solution in Avowed

description:
Robe of the Arcane Cheater is one of the trickier treasure maps in Avowed. This Shatterscarp map points out a specific landmark tucked away in a nondescript landscape that’s easy to miss unless you’re keen on picking up bounty quests.

Making matters worse, the map and its treasure are in dangerous locations as well, though some careful sneaking can get you through without much issue, and the reward is an essential piece of kit for wizards. You’ll pick it up just as you start unlocking higher-level spells that c
title: Robe of the Arcane Cheater treasure map location and solution in Avowed

description: Countless games let you play as a normal, bipedal person; far fewer games let you play as a critter. Stray and Little Kitty, Big City have both made strides in adorable animal protagonists, but an upcoming indie game makes the ambitious choice of putting you in the furry, grasping feet of the humble squirrel. Squirreled Away is a charming, colorful crafting platformer that removes the stresses of the survival genre in favor of the simple joy of washing your little paws, climbing a tree, and chatting with your neighbors.
title: This twist on the survival crafter genre lets you play as a silly little squirrel

description: Supports are the biggest losers in the Marvel Rivals season 1.5 patch, which goes live on Feb. 21. Popular picks, like Cloak and Dagger and Luna Snow, are getting their most powerful abilities toned down to let tanks and damage dealers have a little more fun. And if that wasn’t enough, the worst heroes for a support player to fight off will be even stronger than they already are.
title: Marvel Rivals’ latest patch buffs everyone except support characters

description: Capcom’s upcoming live-action Street Fighter movie has a new director. And like the previous choice to helm the adaptation — Talk to Me directors Michael and Danny Philippou, who just dropped the first trailer for their next movie today — it’s an unexpected and potentially very fun hire: Kitao Sakurai, best known for directing
title: The Street Fighter movie gets a new director who just might give it good, weird vibes

description: We’re still waiting on more news about the upcoming live-action Legend of Zelda adaptation, which was announced back in 2023. In the meantime, however, you can tide yourself over with this beautiful animated short project, which reimagines
title: This Legend of Zelda anime TV opening is so dang good — too bad the show isn’t real

description:
Morgan “RepulseGod” Bamford, a former Fortnite competitor from Australia, was disqualified from the Fortnite Champion Series event in Copenhagen in 2023 after sharing his account with another player in order to qualify for the event. Bamford (or rather, the person who was playing on his account) and his teammate, who goes by Jace online, placed first in a qualifying event in August, which earned the duo a spot in the $4 million Global Championship. That is, until Epic Games learned about Bamford’s actions.

In 2024,
title: Epic Games forces former Fortnite pro to publicly apologize for cheating

description:
Get ready for a game changer, Dropout TV’s latest says — and it doesn’t say much else.

That isn’t exactly true: The 30-second teaser dropped this afternoon promises new frontiers for Game Changer, Dropout’s breakout competition series, in its seventh season. There are bizarre new machines, a ton of strange costumes, and a new addition to the Game Changer set: a whole-ass stage.

But the Game Changer folks always like to hold something back from the audience. I
title: Game Changer season 7 is on the way, says this promising sizzle reel

description:
Microsoft debuted Muse, a generative AI model that can be trained to output video game visuals and predict controller inputs. The company describes the technology as the future of gameplay ideation, not as something to be used in place of human creativity during game development.

Microsoft published its Muse findings in science journal Nature, and posted
title: Microsoft touts generative AI model for recreating video game visuals and controller inputs

description: I downloaded an idle game, Tiny Pasture, onto my work computer this morning. Like Rusty’s Retirement before it, Tiny Pasture lives at the bottom of my desktop screen, overlaid on the windows I’ve got open. In this case, five bunnies are running back and forth on Polygon’s CMS while I attempt to write this post. Created by developer CaveLiquid, Tiny Pasture was released on Monday
title: This post took too long to write because I’m distracted by my digital rabbits

description: Supergiant Games published its second major update for Hades 2 on PC, which is still in early access. The Warsong Update brings players to the summit of Mount Olympus for what it describes as “the final confrontation.” Notably, this update adds Ares, the god of war, to Hades 2, plus numerous extras, from a new animal companion, more story and voice lines, revam
title: Hades 2’s next big update is here — with the ‘final confrontation’

description:
Danny and Michael Philippou, the directing duo behind 2023’s breakout horror hit Talk to Me, are back with a new movie that looks just as scary and stylish as their debut. The new film is called Bring Her Back, and the first teaser trailer, which was released on Wednesday, already looks fantastic.

The trailer doesn’t give too much away, but it seems like it follows some kind of bizarre ritual designed to bring a young girl back from the dead. More importantly than the plot itself, though, is the trailer’s e
title: The new horror movie from the Talk to Me directors looks just as terrifying

description:
The roadmap for Marvel Rivals details what to expect next from the ongoing competitive romp through Marvel’s multiverse.

Season 1 recently started in Marvel Rivals, and the developers at NetEase Games have offered a bit more of what to expect from the game as it continues to add new characters, maps, and modes.
title: What is the Marvel Rivals roadmap?

description: Season 1.5, the mid-season update for Marvel Rivals season 1, brings the final two characters from The Fantastic Four to the game, as well as another major ma
title: What time does Marvel Rivals season 1.5 release in your time zone?

description:
Let’s just take the Band-Aid off: You can’t change your appearance in Avowed.

Once you’ve finished going through character creation — which also includes choosing a background and assigning
title: PSA: You can’t change your appearance in Avowed

description:
You’ll meet Ygwulf during the Avowed main story quest “An Untimely End.”

It starts when you get, well, untimely ended upon arriving in Paradis’ Administration District at the end of “Message from Afar” and features a visit to the Watcher in northeast Dawnshore. At the end, you’ll confront Ygwulf and have a choice to make: kill him or forgive him?

Our A
title: Should you kill or forgive Ygwulf in Avowed?

description:
Writer Marc Guggenheim (X-Men Gold) and artist Kaare Andrews (Iron Fist: The Living Weapon) are the team up bringing you Marvel Comics’ latest team up series, Spider-Man & Wolverine.

“Spider-Man and Wolverine are probably my two favorite Marvel characters to write,” Guggenheim told Polygon via email, “and among my favorites in all of comics. I wrote Peter and Logan very early in my career, so I’m particularly excited about returning to them with a great deal more of experience and skill to lend to the endeavor. Kaare Andrews and I are determined to deliver a comic book b
title: It’s Spider-Man and Wolverine against the ‘Janus Directory’ in new Marvel team up series

description:
There’s a max level cap in Avowed, meaning you can’t unlock literally every ability in the game at once.

Upon leveling up, you’ll earn an ability point to upgrade your abilities or unlock a new one. Attribute points are earned every level until level 10 — from which they’re earned every other level — and can be used to improve your character’s stats. However, you cannot over-level your character to the point where they can drop meteor showers, spin like a whirlwind, and unleash a flurry of blows every other second as
title: What is the max level cap in Avowed?

description:
In 2023, reports emerged from Gamescom that Nintendo was demoing hardware that targeted the Switch 2’s specs to its partners. One of the most interesting details of the report was that the demo used DLSS, or Deep Learning Super Sampling — an AI-powered upscaling technology created by Nvidia and currently exclusive to the graphics cards that Nvidia makes.

DLSS is a powerf
title: What is DLSS, and will it be Switch 2’s secret weapon?

description:
The first season of Your Friendly Neighborhood Spider-Man has wrapped up, and we still don’t have a concrete answer about what happened to Uncle Ben. 

Yes, according to Spider-Man lore, we can assume he’s probably dead. But I maintai
title: Your Friendly Neighborhood Spider-Man pokes around with Parker family lore

description: Tuesday’s reveal of the first batch of products for Magic: The Gathering – Final Fantasy turned quite a few heads, with many fans of the long-running series suddenly curious about how and where to buy some of Wizards of the Coast’s finest shiny cardboard. Part of the reason is just the sheer amount of excellent art in the set,
title: Final Fantasy Magic set adds a card that does 10,000 damage

description:
Captain America: Brave New World never actually refers to returning Incredible Hulk character Samuel Sterns (Tim Blake Nelson) as The Leader — cowardly, if you ask me. But when the supervillain’s bulbous green head is on screen, Brave New World doesn’t skimp. 

As my coworker Petrana Radulovic put it</
title: If you think the Leader looks weird in Captain America: Brave New World, you should try the comics

description: Marvel Rivals is finally reuniting Marvel’s first family, with its new Season 1.5 update. The new patch will bring Human Torch and The Thing into the game, completing the game’s addition of the Fantastic Four team. Both of the game’s new heroes got their own unique trailers on Tuesday, along with another video in which the Marvel Rivals dev team outlined
title: Marvel Rivals trailer finally shows off Human Torch and The Thing ahead of season 1’s big patch

description: A game’s tutorial section is a valuable resource, but it can sometimes feel a little bit awkward. Before you launch into the depths of a big, open-world adventure, developers like to run you through a funnel that teaches you all the main mechanics so you’re properly equipped to venture out into their immaculately crafted campaign. Kingdom Come: Deliverance 2 is no exception to this rule, but it has a particularly beefy tutorial before the player can set out into the kingdom of Bohemia as beleaguered protagonist Henry.
title: Kingdom Come: Deliverance 2’s tutorial is a saga on its own

description: Look, there aren’t many people on Earth more excited about Christopher Nolan’s movie version of the Odyssey than I am. So I have to admit that when the first photo of Matt Damon as Odysseus was revealed on Monday, I (and many history buffs on X) was a little bit disappointed by what I saw: a very bland image of a recognizable actor in an obvious, boring, and inaccurate costume. But my bigger lingering question a
title: The first image from Christopher Nolan’s Odyssey movie isn’t historically accurate, and that’s fine

description: It doesn’t take much to make a great thriller, particularly when a serial killer is involved. A little bit of clever framing, whether it’s the seven deadly sins or the FBI using the expertise of one killer to catch another, is all you really need to cook up something great. In the best examples, even the smallest details wrap back around to the central story, and every character beat has some larger significance to or ramification for the case at hand. Unfortuna
title: To Catch a Killer, now on Netflix, is a great thriller lost in the details

description:
Fortnite places you in the role of a bank robber in Chapter 6 Season 2, which has the official title of “Lawless.”

The heist theme is a popular one in the Fortnite realm, as players can complete a train heist as recently as Chapter 6 Season 1. However, trains are not the only source of highly-valued loot as a few POIs are being updated to include banks.

Here’s when Fortnite Chapter 6 Season 2 releases in your time zone, and what you
title: What time does Fortnite Chapter 6 Season 2 release?

description: On my second run through Keep Driving — a wonderful, turn-based, pixel-art game about taking long road trips as an aimless youth in the early 2000s — I picked up a hitchhiker called The Hurricane. This young woman was attractive and cool, much cooler than me. But she was also kind of annoying. She kept filling up the precious inventory space in my car’s trunk and the well behind the front seats with useless trash: used toilet rolls, packs of cigarettes with only one smoke left in them, spilled coffee cups. And she really wanted to party, which ended up g
title: Keep Driving’s perfectly annoying hitchhikers are a game-design master class
